item.title: Racket notes
item.description: Basic 1#lang racket 2(provide (all-defined-out)) 3 4;this is a comment 5 6(define s "hello") 7 8(define x 3) 9(define y (+ x 2)) 10 11(define cube1 12 (lambda (x) 13 (* x (* x x)))) 14 15(define cube2 16 (lambda (x) 17 (* x x x))) 18 19(define (cube3 x) 20 (* x x x)) 21 22(define (pow1 x y) 23 (if (=y 0) 24 1 25 (* x (pow1 x (- y 1))))) 26 27; currying 28(define pow2 29 (lambda (x) 30 (lambda (y) 31 (pow1 x y)))) List Empty list: null () doesn"t work for null but '() does build a list: (list e1 .
